languages.text: "Но я вижу конец этого пути для тебя, {name}. Он обрывается раньше моего — как мимолетная вспышка, сияние падающей звезды. Краткое, прекрасное мгновение..."
"But I can see where the road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment..."
languages.original_text: "Но я вижу конец этого пути для тебя, {name}. Он обрывается раньше моего — как мимолетная вспышка, сияние падающей звезды. Краткое, прекрасное мгновение..."

traits.locale_text: "But I can see where this road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, a fallen star's shimmer. A short, beautiful moment..."
"But I can see where this road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, a fallen star's shimmer. A short, beautiful moment..."
"But I can see where the road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment..."
"But I can see where the road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment..."
"But I can see where the road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment..."

languages.text: “不过，我能看到你的终点，{name}。你的道路结束得比我早得多，仿佛一闪而过的明光，仿佛陨落恒星散发的微光……短暂而美丽的瞬间……”
languages.original_text: "But I can see where the road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment..."

traits.locale_text: “不过，我能看到你的终点，{name}。你的道路结束得比我早得多，仿佛一闪而过的明光，仿佛陨落恒星散发的微光……短暂而美丽的瞬间……”

languages.text: 「だが、お前の道がどこで終わるのかはわかる、{name}。我の道よりも随分早く終わりを迎える。一瞬の閃光のように、落ちる星のかすかな光のように。短く、美しい瞬間…」
languages.original_text: "But I can see where the road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment..."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、お前の道がどこで終わるのかはわかる、{name}。我の道よりも随分早く終わりを迎える。一瞬の閃光のように、落ちる星のかすかな光のように。短く、美しい瞬間…」

languages.text: « Mais je vois où votre route s'arrête, {name}. Elle s'interrompt bien avant la mienne, comme un éclat de lumière ou le scintillement d'une étoile filante. Un instant à la fois fugace et magnifique... »
languages.original_text: "But I can see where the road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment..."

traits.locale_text: « Mais je vois où votre route s'arrête, {name}. Elle s'interrompt bien avant la mienne, comme un éclat de lumière ou le scintillement d'une étoile filante. Un instant à la fois fugace et magnifique... »

languages.text: «Pero sí diviso dónde termina el camino para ti, {name}. Y termina mucho antes que el mío; es como un destello fugaz, el centelleo de una estrella distante. Un momento breve y hermoso...».
languages.original_text: "But I can see where the road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment..."

traits.locale_text: «Pero sí diviso dónde termina el camino para ti, {name}. Y termina mucho antes que el mío; es como un destello fugaz, el centelleo de una estrella distante. Un momento breve y hermoso...».

languages.text: "Aber ich sehe, wo die Straße für Euch endet, {name}. Sie endet früher als meine – wie ein flüchtiger Blitz, das Leuchten eines gefallenen Sterns. Ein kurzer, wunderschöner Augenblick ..."
languages.original_text: "But I can see where the road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment..."

traits.locale_text: "Aber ich sehe, wo die Straße für Euch endet, {name}. Sie endet früher als meine – wie ein flüchtiger Blitz, das Leuchten eines gefallenen Sterns. Ein kurzer, wunderschöner Augenblick ...

languages.text: "Fakat yolun senin için nerede bittiğini görüyorum {name}. Senin yolun, benimkinden çok daha erken bitiyor. Uçup giden bir an, kayan bir yıldızın pırıltısı gibi. Kısa ama güzel bir an..."
languages.original_text: "But I can see where the road ends for you, {name}. It ends much sooner than mine — like a fleeting flash, the glimmer of a fallen star. A short, beautiful moment..."

traits.locale_text: "Fakat yolun senin için nerede bittiğini görüyorum {name}. Senin yolun, benden çok daha erken bitiyor. Uçup giden bir an, kayan bir yıldızın pırıltısı gibi. Kısa ama güzel bir an..."
